item.title: Data Scientists are developers; their tools just suck
item.description: Data science is not a new discipline. In some sense it even pre-dates application development. You wouldnâ€™t know that by looking at the average enterprise nowadays. The popular perception is that enterprises today struggle to deliver any tangible value from Big Data.
